post.subject: An Outstanding Partner Channel Details
post.content:
The Bangboo Channel An Outstanding Partner is a permanent channel through which players can Signal Search by spending Boopons.


Signal Search Details

• Before Signal Searching for Bangboo, Proxies should select an S-Rank Bangboo. Upon obtaining an S-Rank Bangboo through Signal Search, the Signal is guaranteed to be the selected S-Rank Bangboo.

• If Proxies wish to change their selection, the Signal Search count for the guarantee will not be reset.

• Selectable Bangboo: Butler, Safety, Amillion, Rocketboo, Plugboo, Resonaboo, Sharkboo, Bangvolver


※ This channel is a Bangboo Channel. The Search count for guaranteed Signals in this Channel is effective only in the Bangboo Channel and is independent of and unaffected by other types of Channels.

※ For more information on Signal Searches, please press Details at the bottom-left of the Search page.

Upon obtaining an S-Rank Bangboo through Signal Search, the Signal is guaranteed to be the selected S-Rank Bangboo. • If Proxies wish to change their selection, the Signal Search count for the guarantee will not be reset. • Selectable Bangboo: Butler, Safety, Amillion, Rocketboo, Plugboo, Resonaboo, Sharkboo, Bangvolver ※ This channel is a Bangboo Channel. The Search count for guaranteed Signals in this Channel is effective only in the Bangboo Channel and is independent of and unaffected by other types of Channels. ※ For more information on Signal Searches, please press Details at the bottom-left of the Search page.
